title: Toll the Dead
content:
Toll the Dead Necromancy Cantrip 1~12 Damage 1d12 Necrotic Ring the bell of impending doom. If the target is at full health, you deal 1d8 Necrotic damage instead. 18m WIS Save Action

Necromancy Cantrip

Ring the bell of impending doom. If the target is at full health, you deal 1d8 Necrotic damage instead.

Toll the Dead is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Toll the Dead is a necromancy cantrip unique to the Cleric subclass, Death Domain. Toll the Dead is a Cantrip from the Necromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buff Characters, or interacting with the environment.

Toll the Dead Information

Description: Ring the bell of impending doom. If the target is at full health, you deal 1d8 Necrotic damage instead. Level: Cantrip School: Necromancy Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: WIS Can explode nearby corpses for extra damage. (Needs confirmation)

How to Acquire Toll the Dead

Toll the Dead can be acquired by the following classes:

Death Domain Warlock Wizard

Toll the Dead can be cast by using the following features:

Magic Initiate: Cleric Magic Initiate: Warlock Magic Initiate: Wizard

Toll the Dead Tips & Notes

At character level 5, the damage increases to 2d12 Necrotic (2d8 Necrotic if undamaged). At character level 10, the damage increases to 3d12 Necrotic (3d8 Necrotic if undamaged). Notes & Tips go here
